title: Subpart 80-4 - REQUIREMENTS FOR EXTENSIONS AND ANNOTATIONS OF CERTIFICATES IN THE CLASSROOM TEACHING SERVICE APPLIED FOR ON OR AFTER FEBRUARY 2, 2004 AND IN THE SCHOOL COUNSELOR TITLE APPLIED FOR ON OR AFTER FEBRUARY 2, 2023
content:
Subpart 80-4 - REQUIREMENTS FOR EXTENSIONS AND ANNOTATIONS OF CERTIFICATES IN THE CLASSROOM TEACHING SERVICE APPLIED FOR ON OR AFTER FEBRUARY 2, 2004 AND IN THE SCHOOL COUNSELOR TITLE APPLIED FOR ON OR AFTER FEBRUARY 2, 2023

State Regulations
§ 80-4.1 - Application of this Subpart and definitions
§ 80-4.2 - General requirements
§ 80-4.3 - Requirements for the extension of a certificate
§ 80-4.4 - Requirements for annotation of a certificate-severe or multiple disabilities

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
